Message.Msg: 25 years! In a country where everyone is in it for him- or herself and relationships are only good until they aren't, you two have shown us an example of growth and fulfillment with a common purpose. My sincere congratulations go to the two of you.

Congrats on 25 years! Vegas sounds like a great place to celebrate. We go to Atlantic City for a weekend once a year to meet up with one of my best friends and her husband. It's the perfect 1/2 way mark for both of us ever since she moved to NY. We have a great time even if we sit at separate tables half the time. lol
Sully, couldn't you wish John a happy anniversary without bringing your obsession into it? I mean seriously. It only shows how obsessed you are.

Amazing you could find a blow up doll or skeletor no self esteem gal who would put up with your 60 year old teenage ways, work your z50com ebay all day and night while you melt a chat board, and say not a word as you run her daughter and grandchild off, and take her to live in a rattlesnake infested trailer in the desert. The fact that all of the usual board troll idiots pat you on the back makes me really believe it! Not. Ho boy! I'm so happy that I have nary a care in the world and my day is nice profits with no rattlesnakes.

That was too funny! You are pure class my friend. Poor class! I bet John ditched the wife at the slots and want looking for Doctor Clarify again! To prove my point, I bet suddenly Doctor Clarify and Bush_To_ Go will pop up today and oooh I'm so sure it'll be the real one. Of course not. Poor board trolls. Poor broke lonely angry obsessed old board trolls.

Message.Title: Good Morning Fellow Ebayers
Message.Msg: Thank You for all the well wishes, hope we can be here on our 50th ~ LOL Vegas had changed a lot over the years! The Sahara still sits lights out and fenced and the Nascar Cafe is nowhere to be found. I came home with $18 more dollars then I left with, my wife came home -$110 We're looking forward to another quick trip there since it's so close to home now. Atlantic City, I've been there once. Kind of neat having Gambling on the waterfront. PS: It's going to be a hot one today: 111°

Hush hush my son, you don't want John catching a cold when he's worked so hard to delete, and hope everyone forgets, his early melt posts of his trolling for boys in Buckskin Park. Why live in the past just because the board trolls do? It's bright new day!
